title: Claude-DA: Natural Language Data Analysis API

reviewerNotes: 30s query timeout mechanism unspecified (design should clarify MCP server native behavior)
disallowed_tools list narrower than PRD (allowed_tools wildcard handles this implicitly)
Audit log timing for streaming requests needs clarification at design time
Exact PyPI package name for Agent SDK should be verified at design time
Python minimum version and sample LiteLLM proxy config to be determined at design time
agent.py dependency table lists 'prompt' but agent takes system_prompt as string (minor)
query_timeout spec deviation should be formally acknowledged
permission_mode value not specified in ClaudeAgentOptions config
Design Section 2.6 streaming return type updated to match plan (container pattern)
ResultMessage.usage may be None — handle gracefully in streaming and audit
Schema text 12K limit is the full prompt limit — schema alone should be tighter
GenericStreamingChunk may need tool_use: None field for LiteLLM compatibility

concerns: T-021 and T-027 exceed 15-min guideline but are unambiguous — acceptable
Phase 2 Groups 2.1 and 2.2 can start in parallel — summary updated
